name: httpx Text–Code Retrieval Pairs (AST-generated)
description: Natural language query–code pairs programmatically generated from encode/httpx using AST analysis. No external API calls used.

query_construction.action: Function name converted to action phrase (snake_case → natural language)
query_construction.docstring: First line of docstring used as natural query
query_construction.keyword: Keywords extracted from arg names, type annotations, return types
query_construction.signature: Queries based on parameter types and return types
query_construction.context: File path context added to queries
